name: PAT_ENC_4
description: This table supplements the PAT_ENC, PAT_ENC_2, and PAT_ENC_3 tables. It contains additional information related to patient encounters or appointments.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: FAMILY_SIZE
columns.description: The number of members in the patient's family.

columns.name: VISIT_NUMBER
columns.description: The visit number for the given contact.

columns.name: PAT_CNCT_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient contact indicator category number for the patient encounter.

columns.name: DENTAL_STUDENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider who is the dental student associated with the patient.

columns.name: LOC_VISIT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location that is associated with the visit.

columns.name: COPAY_NOT_COVERED_C_NAME
columns.description: The copay not covered category number for the patient encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_COLL_FLAG_YN
columns.description: The copay collected flag that indicates whether a copay was collected from the patient encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_COLL_PERSON
columns.description: The unique ID number of the person who collected the patient's copay for the encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_WAIVE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The copay waive reason category number for the patient encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_MIN_VALUE
columns.description: The value of the minimum copay.

columns.name: COPAY_RECEIPT_NUM
columns.description: The receipt number of the copay collected.

columns.name: BEN_ADJ_COINS_AMT
columns.description: The adjudicated coinsurance amount for the visit calculated by the benefits engine.

columns.name: BEN_ADJ_DEDUCT_AMT
columns.description: The portion of the self-pay amount applied to the deductible for the visit.

columns.name: PAT_HOMELESS_YN
columns.description: Indicates if a patient is homeless.

columns.name: PAT_HOMELESS_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: Characterizes the patients homelessness (for example chronic or sporadic)

columns.name: PERCENTAGE_OF_FPL
columns.description: Indicates where the patient falls on the federal poverty level as a percentage.

columns.name: MSG_RECEIVED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the encounter creation In Basket message was received.

columns.name: TOBACCO_USE_VRFY_YN
columns.description: This column indicates whether the patient's tobacco usage has been verified. A Y indicates the usage was verified. An N or null indicates the tobacco usage was not verified. It extracts a virtual item, which is calculated using EPT-19202.

columns.name: CR_TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The transaction type category number for the encounter(E-Visit or Copay).

columns.name: ORIG_ENC_CSN
columns.description: Holds the CSN of the encounter this Remote Consult encounter is responding to.

columns.name: PHYS_BP_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded blood pressure for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_TEMP_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded temperature for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_TEMPSRC_COMNTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded temperature source for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_PULSE_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded pulse for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_WEIGHT_COMNTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded weight for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_HEIGHT_COMNTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded height for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_RESP_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded respirations for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_SPO2_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded oxygen saturation level (SpO2) for this visit.

columns.name: PHYS_PF_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column contains the comments entered for the last recorded peak flow for this visit.

columns.name: INTERPRT_ASGN_CMT
columns.description: Comments regarding the interpreter assigned to the patient's contact.

columns.name: PAT_HOUSING_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the patient's current housing status. This is a category list item that may contain values such as Stable/Permanent, Temporary, Unstable, or Unknown.

columns.name: BCRA_AGE
columns.description: The patient's age at the time of the risk assessment.

columns.name: BCRA_MENARCHE_AGE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's risk factor category number for the Age at Menarche breast cancer risk factor.

columns.name: BCRA_FST_LIVBIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's risk factor category number for the Age at First Live Birth breast cancer risk factor.

columns.name: BCRA_FST_DEG_REL_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's risk factor category number for the Number of Affected First Degree Relatives breast cancer risk factor. Only first degree relatives are considered.

columns.name: BCRA_NUM_BIOPSY_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's risk factor category number for the Number of Breast Biopsies breast cancer risk factor.

columns.name: BCRA_ATYP_HYPLSA_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's risk factor category number for the Presence of Atypical Hyperplasia in Breast Biopsies breast cancer risk factor.

columns.name: BCRA_RACE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's risk factor category number for the Race breast cancer risk factor.

columns.name: LB_ENC_START_DT
columns.description: This identifies the start date of a Lab Requisition encounter.

columns.name: LB_ENC_END_DT
columns.description: This identifies the end date of a Lab Requisition encounter.

columns.name: WAITING_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Waiting List record associated with this encounter. This column can be used to link to the WAITING_LIST_INFO table.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: The submitting organization that the results for the lab orders on this encounter should be sent to.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: BILL_TO_SUBMITTER_C_NAME
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the submitter should be billed for any lab procedures performed.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The submitter account to be used when billing laboratory procedures.

columns.name: LB_BLNG_ENC_SRVC_DT
columns.description: This identifies the service date of the Billing encounter used for Lab Billing. The date is in the time zone of the lab department that created the encounter.

columns.name: ECHKIN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the eCheck-In for this appointment.

columns.name: PB_VISIT_HAR_ID
columns.description: The hospital account record used by the Professional Billing system for a given contact.

columns.name: TECHNICAL_REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The MassHealth technical referral associated with the encounter.

columns.name: CR_CLIENT_REF_IDNT
columns.description: Used to store the client ID returned by the copay reduction web service

columns.name: CR_BENEFIT_REF_IDNT
columns.description: The benefit reference ID number of the patient for the current encounter.

columns.name: CR_MESSAGE_ENGLISH
columns.description: The copay message returned by the web service in English.

columns.name: CR_MESSAGE_SPANISH
columns.description: The copay message returned by the web service in Spanish.

columns.name: CR_QUERY_SENT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the copay reduction web service query was sent to the server

columns.name: CR_RESP_RECVD_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Specifies the instant when the response to the copay reduction web service query was received

columns.name: CR_QUERY_ERROR
columns.description: Specifies the error received in the response to the query sent out to get the copay reduction for the current patient encounter.

columns.name: COPAY_REDUCTION_AMT
columns.description: The amount by which the copay should be reduced for the current visit
